meanings.sent1: Yesterday, we carpooled to work to save gas.
meanings.sent2: They carpooled to the concert together.
meanings.sent3: The friends carpooled to the beach and sang songs along the way.
meanings.sent4: The students carpooled like a team of efficient drivers.
meanings.sent5: Carpooling is when people share a ride to the same destination.

meanings.sent1: Last week, we carpooled to the game.
meanings.sent2: She carpooled with her neighbors last month.
meanings.sent3: The family carpooled to the zoo and had a blast.
meanings.sent4: The team carpooled to the championship and won.
meanings.sent5: They carpooled all summer and saved money on gas.
